source.0e13cac7:
1.Various age groups have been affected due to police brutality in the US where the age group between 25-29 being the worst affected till date.
2.Number of deaths in the US from the year 2015 till 2020  appears to have reduced drastically .
3.Deaths that took place monthly between the 5 years has also been visualized where the month of March appears to have seen the most deaths that is 550.
4.The victims killed by the police were either shot or shot as well as tasered were the percentage of victims that were only shot is very high being 95% and the victims that were shot and tasered is 4.99%.
5.The number of men killed in the US is much higher as compared to women each year.
6.Victims belonged to different races that were killed each year,where the amount of white people killed has been the highest throught the 5 years followed by Black people.
7. Percentage of victims showing signs of mental illness and what kind of threat level they possessed can be compared in order to decide whether the mental illness plays a role in the level of threat exhibiting from the victim.
8.Finally,the number of victims killed in each state of the US can be seen.
